mapper.select: select member_id, member_passwd, member_name, member_address, member_email, member_phone, TO_CHAR(member_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS member_birth from member where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_passwd = #{member_passwd}, member_address = #{member_address}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, member_email = #{member_email} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
UPDATE member SET member_state = 2 WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
